channel.title: 随笔 on Home
channel.description: Recent content in 随笔 on Home

item.title: 对于找工作、暑期实习的些许观点
item.description: We are introduced to the narrator, a pilot, and his ideas about grown-ups Once when I was six years old I saw a magnificent picture in a book, called True Stories from Nature, about the primeval forest. It was a picture of a boa constrictor in the act of swallowing an animal. Here is a copy of the drawing. In the book it said: “Boa constrictors swallow their prey whole, without chewing it.
